thread.title: This is a special hotel
thread.title_full: This is a special hotel - Review of Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: David B
title: This is a special hotel
text: I loved my stay here. I've stayed in a number of NY's boutique hotels but this one beats them all for 2 reasons. Firstly, the reading room/breakfast/happy hour on Level 2 is spacious and inviting. Secondly the hotel, close to the New York Public Library continues the theme by installing bookshelves throughout the hotel.
